lines.text: [after lustful Kate approaches a man called Bill, who exposes himself in the middle of the wilderness, and he lets her give him a fellatio]
Kate! What will people think?
[first lines]

[ringing doorbell]
I hope the professor's home.
I don't know, I always thought he was a little eccentric.
I think he's kinda cute.
Look at the size of that monster between his legs.
Yeah, really.
Kate, do you think that gentleman over on the rocks may be able to solve our problem?
I don't know about *your* problem, but he can sure solve mine.
Now about tomorrow, Kate, I think we should get up very early if we're going to the desert.
Well, professor, I really don't think that I want to go on another expedition with you into the desert. The last time we went to the desert we were lost for days.
Nonsense. Anyway, the map was wrong.

[the professor runs and cowers behind some sagebrush after hearing a loud roar,]
You asshole, what are you doin'?
What was that?
Haven't you ever heard a pussy roar before?
I'm sorry Kate, but I just...
You'll never know how much. Where's my clothes?
[as the professor reaches out to examine the amulet around his neck]
Hey, don't touch, mister. Never touch the body. What are you, some kinda faggot?
I couldn't help but admire the medallion around your neck. Where did you get it?
What's it to you where I got it?
[Kate reaches for the medallion]
Now, *she* can touch.

[responding to Kate's demand that she be allowed to accompany the men to the Indian camp]
The answer's still, No. If those Indians had half a mind they'd eat you alive... especially with those beauties
[pinches her nipple through her blouse]

[slaps his hand away]
That doesn't scare me one bit. I've been eaten by Indians before.
Oh yeah? What tribe?
The *Cleveland* Indians. All ten of 'em.
Hmm, kind of the designated titter, huh?
[last lines]
Never could understand white man.
